name: Agricultural and Industrial Exhibition in Borås
obverse: Bust of Oscar II facing right. Pearls surround the edge of the obverse.
obverse_inscriptions: OSCAR II SVERIGES OCH NORGES KONUNG
reverse: The coat of arms of Borås (two sheep sears) with a crown on top. Behind the coat of arms are agricultural and industrial instruments.
reverse_inscriptions: MINNE AF LANDTBRUKS OCH INDUSTRIMÖTET I BORÅS D.4.6 AUGUSTI 1880 *
description: This medal was made to commemorate the agricultural and industrial exhibition held in Borås, Sweden in 1880.
